property.name: tez.am.view-acls
property.description: AM view ACLs. This allows the specified users/groups to view the status of the AM and all DAGs that run within this AM. Value format: Comma separated list of users, followed by whitespace, followed by a comma separated list of groups.

property.name: tez.runtime.optimize.local.fetch
property.description: If the shuffle input is on the local host bypass the http fetch and access the files directly.

property.name: tez.task.generate.counters.per.io
property.description: Whether to generate counters on a per-edge basis for a Tez DAG. Helpful for in-depth analysis.

property.name: tez.runtime.pipelined.sorter.sort.threads
property.description: Tez runtime pipelined sorter sort threads

property.name: tez.runtime.io.sort.mb
property.description: The size of the sort buffer when output needs to be sorted

property.name: tez.counters.max
property.description: The number of allowed counters for the executing DAG

property.name: tez.counters.max.groups
property.description: The number of allowed counter groups for the executing DAG

property.name: tez.runtime.shuffle.fetch.buffer.percent
property.description: Fraction (0-1) of the available memory which can be used to retain shuffled data

property.name: tez.runtime.shuffle.memory.limit.percent
property.description: This property determines the maximum size of a shuffle segment which can be fetched to memory. Fraction (0-1) of shuffle memory (after applying tez.runtime.shuffle.fetch.buffer.percent)

property.name: tez.task.launch.cmd-opts
property.description: Java options for tasks. The Xmx value is derived based on tez.task.resource.memory.mb and is 80% of this value by default. Used only if the value is not specified explicitly by the DAG definition.

property.name: tez.am.launch.cmd-opts
property.description: Java options for the Tez AppMaster process. The Xmx value is derived based on tez.am.resource.memory.mb and is 80% of the value by default. Used only if the value is not specified explicitly by the DAG definition.
